mapper.insert: INSERT INTO order_detail (member_num, order_num, item_num, item_cnt) SELECT c.member_num AS member_num, CONCAT(DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y%m%d'), LPAD(o.id, 8, '0')) AS order_num, c.item_num AS item_num, c.cart_cnt AS item_cnt FROM cart c CROSS JOIN (SELECT FLOOR(RAND() * 1000) + 1 AS id) AS o WHERE c.member_num = #{member_num};
